title: Eden's Garden
description: [Ménage and More: Erotic Ménage a Trois Romance, M/M/F with M/M, HFN]Eden Burns has come to a crossroad in her life. For the last couple of years, she's lived the life she thought she'd always wanted, up to now, when a sudden tragedy strikes, leaving her with time to put everything into perspective as she returns to her hometown to reconnect with those who mean the most to her.Kevin and Cliff work at Eden's Garden, a family-owned nursery, and when the owner's beautiful daughter returns home, sparks fly and the threesome quickly forms a friendship. Sparks fly and bonds are made as each discovers the joys of ménage sex for the first time.Never before has Eden been so wild and carefree. Her life is changing for the better, but she still faces some challenges as her liberation takes hold. Can she break from the old to continue on with the new, and just where will this romance lead her?Note: This book contains double vaginal penetration.
author: Xondra Day
